Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Trebuchet Airdrop
Description.Details: Thanks to the mech's common status, this is a permanent contract offer for use of a Trebuchet TBT-5N. Purchasing this contract will permit the airdrop of a Trebuchet TBT-5N when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
